nodes.text: A city-ship was a large vessel that served a dual purpose as a habitat.
The first city-ships were built on Ska Gora in Tython system, after the planet was colonized, which was where practically all planet's population lived.

Great orbital city-ships were constructed by the Duros to provide an alternative to the polluted surface of their homeworld, Duro. Many great pilots came from these Duros-made vessels. They were attacked during the Clone Wars, when the Confederacy of Independent Systems invaded Duro as part of Operation Durge's Lance. General Grievous used the captured Jyvus Space City as his command post while launching his groundside offensive.

During the Yuuzhan Vong War, the Yuuzhan Vong forces that invaded Duro brought down several of these city-ships onto the surface, while one managed to escape into deep space using its sublight thrusters.
An aquatic city-ship was the Great Ship of Drexel, constructed by survivors of a pirate crew that crash-landed on the water planet.
